Title: Long Way Back from Hell
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Ashley Lyle, Bart Nickerson, Michelle Paradise (executive story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by), Marguerite MacIntyre (staff writer)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Claire Holt, Phoebe Tonkin
Plot: Rebekah's past comes back to haunt her.
